review: Very good Option  on the Way to Badrinath 9 km. from Karnparyag. Spacious and clean Rooms ,Fresh environment, nice views of river alaknanda and many more things that i love this hotel too much.Mr. Tika Prasad Maikhuri the owner of the hotel is very nice person.Room service is also good. Helping  and polite Staff.Good Option on the way to Badrinath.
name: Bhikaji Deshmukh
